name: Raider
description:
Raider is a 30 year-old Caucasian Female.

A hardened raider found dead on the overpass near Novac. Worn leather armor and a 10mm pistol suggest she was prepared for combat, but her life was cut short by the vigilant snipers protecting the town.

Raider's Personality: Ruthless and opportunistic, this raider would stop at nothing to survive in the harsh Mojave Wasteland. She preyed on travelers and unwary settlements, showing no remorse for her actions.

Raider's Backstory: A survivor of the wasteland who turned to raiding as a means of survival. She operated alone or with small groups, ambushing travelers and scavenging what she could. Her life was cut short near Novac, likely by the town's defenders.
